definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Hey, Freddie, come over and give Bill here a good slap on the back.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，弗雷迪，过来向比尔道贺吧。

sentences.english: Bingley replied that he did, and made his congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 彬格莱说他看到了，又向她道贺。

sentences.english: Withdrawn far, mocking me with mock-congratulatory signs and bows.
sentences.chinese: 扯远些，让嘲弄的道贺躬影嘲笑也不着急。

sentences.english: My family join me in offering you our hearty congratulations and best wishes.
sentences.chinese: 我家人和我向您表达衷心的道贺和最好的祝福。

sentences.english: They could even pat a player on the back to congratulate him for scoring a goal.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至可以在球员射门时轻拍他的背部向他道贺。

sentences.english: Please permit me to congratulate you on your being promoted as director of this department.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我为您升为本部门的主任而道贺。

sentences.english: They celebrated his bisexualrthday with a dance party.
sentences.chinese: 也们举行舞会来道贺他的生日。

sentences.english: I extend my best wishes and congratulations to you.
sentences.chinese: 向你道贺和致以良好的祝愿。

sentences.english: Lin Wu Yang composure, say oneself just to come for congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 林午阳表现镇静，推说自己只是前来道贺。

sentences.english: I thought all my ancestors would descend from heaven to congratulate me.
sentences.chinese: 我当时以为我的祖先会从天而降来向我道贺。

sentences.english: I congratulate Governor Palin for all that they've achieved.
sentences.chinese: 也向裴林州长道贺，为他们所成就的一切。

definition: to congratulate respectfully/to express good wishes
congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations
to greet/to go out to meet
to return a greeting/to send a gift in return
to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
to pay a formal visit/to call to pay respects/to meet one's senior or superior
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
